glsa.title: fastjar: Directory traversal
glsa.synopsis: Two directory traversal vulnerabilities have been found in fastjar, allowing remote attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary files.

background.p: fastjar is a Java archiver written in C.

description.p: Two directory traversal vulnerabilities have been discovered in fastjar. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted JAR file, possibly resulting in the creation or truncation of arbitrary files.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All fastjar users should upgrade to the latest version:
